definition: band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: At the time of the video Jackson looked almost identical to the statue.
sentences.chinese: 在當時的錄影帶裏傑克遜和那座雕像更爲相似。

sentences.english: Makes sure the official recordings are given to the Jury President after the competition.
sentences.chinese: 在比賽後，將大會官方錄影帶交給裁判長。

sentences.english: In my opinion, the best non-surfing activity is to watch surf videos. That subliminal power is very persuasive.
sentences.chinese: 我的意見是最好的非衝浪運動就是看衝浪錄影帶。

sentences.english: Rent a video tape of an English movie—and don't read the subtitles .
sentences.chinese: 租一部英語電影的錄影帶，但是不要看中文字幕。

sentences.english: The same might be said of the music videos born of this album.
sentences.chinese: 同樣的評價可以套用到隨這張專輯誕生的音樂錄影帶。

sentences.english: So now in your music videos you've worked with Lee Da Hae and Lee Hyo Ri.
sentences.chinese: 你你和李多海和李孝利合作了你的音樂錄影帶。

sentences.english: Converting Historical Performing Program VHS Tape into VCD.
sentences.chinese: 歷年演出錄影帶轉成VCD保存計劃案。

definition: to avoid the important and dwell on the trivial/to keep silent about major charges while admitting minor ones
tablet computer (iPad, Android devices etc)/CL:臺|台[tai2]
paper money/a bill (e.g. 100 yuan)/CL:張|张[zhang1],紮|扎[za1]
to file/to save a file (computer)/saved data (for a video game etc)
